Sentencas: Phases based on layered lanthanide nickelates are considered as promising electrode materials for various electrochemical devices, including solid oxide fuel cells and electrolysis cells.
Titulo: Modernized Synthesis Technique of Pr2NiO4+δ-Based Complex Oxides Using Low-Temperature Salt Melts

Sentencas: While such compounds may be prepared using either solid state or solution-assisted syntheses, each of these approaches entails certain problems.

Sentencas: In the present work, we propose a novel approach for the simple and straightforward preparation of Pr2NiO4+delta-based materials.
Titulo: Modernized Synthesis Technique of Pr2NiO4+δ-Based Complex Oxides Using Low-Temperature Salt Melts

Sentencas: This approach involves co-melting of initial nitrate components, followed by high-temperature decomposition of the obtained mixture.
Titulo: Modernized Synthesis Technique of Pr2NiO4+δ-Based Complex Oxides Using Low-Temperature Salt Melts

Sentencas: The developed synthesis method exhibits a number of advantages over conventional techniques, enabling highly dispersed and single-phase powders to be obtained at a reduced synthesis temperature of 1050 degrees C. Therefore, the results of this work open new possibilities for the cost-effective preparation of Ruddlesden-Popper oxide phases.
Titulo: Modernized Synthesis Technique of Pr2NiO4+δ-Based Complex Oxides Using Low-Temperature Salt Melts
